name: SmokeCount
0:
”Alexa, open smoke count”
”Alexa, launch smoke count”
”Alexa, begin smoke count”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smoke count
des:
Smoking is bad for health we all know that but it can't be stopped in a day*. The idea behind the skill is to get statistics of smoke and reduce the count. You can give count of smoke to skill daily to keep it in records. 
This skill can easily track your record and can provide you summary of your tar and nicotine consumption. You can also get average time and money spent on recorded cigarette count(s).
You will get some cigarette quitting facts and health impacts in daily smoke count as well.

You can also use basic functions of skill as stopping skill with "stop", cancelling event with "cancel" or ask for "help".

*The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
